item.title: Vibration Indicating Systems – Broad Band – RB211

remarks.para: Except for ER operations, one may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions,
For -535C engine, both master and internal gearbox magnetic chip detectors are inspected before each takeoff, and
Operations are limited to not more than three flight days before repair is made.
Avoid flight into known or forecast icing conditions.
No flight into known or forecast icing conditions.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "AVM INDICATION FOR (L or R) ENGINE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Inspect master and internal gearbox magnetic chip detector (AMM 79-21-03/401).
